posts.post_title: FS/FT:T206 Chief Bender w/ Trees SGC 40 SOLD
posts.post_content:
A non paying bidder on Ebay is the reason for this sale.But his loss is your gain! 
I have for sale a T206 Chief Bender w/ Trees.It has been VG by SGC.Im looking to get  for it and that includes shipping with confirmation.First to pm,post,or email gets it.Paypal gift preferred or add 3%.Check or Money Order is fine as well.Im also willing to trade for T210's.Thanks and have a good day.Jason
